document.full_text: a nurse is suspected of inadvertently tainting intravenous painkillers at st. cloud hospital while seeking drugs, spreading bacterial infections to 23 patients since october, the hospital said on wednesday.
document.title: minnesota nurse may have stolen painkillers, infected patients
lines_and_colors: a nurse is suspected of inadvertently tainting intravenous painkillers at st. cloud hospital while seeking drugs, spreading bacterial infections to 23 patients since october, the hospital said on wednesday.
